column4: hello everyone, i just completed the first stage on the install for 5.10 and itrestarted to computer to do all the downloading and such...but when i restarted it just loaded winderz again...no grub...and i wrote it to the MBR...any suggestion?
cuzi know it messes with it
i just got a new computer
just login using a livcd .. chroot to the current install .. and then repair the boot manager
